alert.note: Alert for Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 04 at 3:01PM MDT until April 05 at 2:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 2 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Mainly the eastern slopes of the Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 2 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft
